title: Checkbox Not Displayed on Settings Page
description: The checkbox element is missing from the settings page, affecting user input options.

title: Login Button Unresponsive After Password Entry
description: After entering a valid password, clicking the login button does not trigger any action.

title: Dropdown Menu Overlaps Footer on Mobile View
description: On smaller screens, the dropdown menu extends beyond its container and overlaps the footer.

title: Search Results Fail to Load on First Attempt
description: Users must refresh or retry to see search results, disrupting the expected flow.

title: Notification Banner Fails to Dismiss on Click
description: Clicking the close icon on the notification banner has no effect, leaving it stuck on screen.
